country.country_description: Kryutoria is a small country located on the outer edges of the Milky Way galaxy. It is a peaceful planet populated by friendly, intelligent creatures.
country.people_description: The people of Kryutoria are a tall, slender race with green skin and four arms. They are a peaceful, resourceful people, skilled in engineering and technology.
country.language_description: Kryutorii is a complex language with many subtle nuances. It is composed of many different dialects, and each dialect offers a unique perspective on the world.
country.example_sentence_translation: Joy and peace be upon you.
